special_text:
When Adam Warlock dies, create a 0/1 white Egg creature token with “At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice this creature. When you do, return target Adam planeswalker from your graveyard to the battlefield.”
[0]: Until end of turn, Adam Warlock becomes a 4/4 white Avatar creature with flying. Remove a loyalty counter from him.
[-2]: Exile another target nonland permanent until Adam Warlock leaves the battlefield.
[-3]: Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control.
